name: Army Across Time
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Legacy of the First World © 2017, Paizo Inc.
effect: five 5-ft. cubes of temporal possibility plus one additional cube/level
text:
This spell functions as ally across time as noted above with two exceptions.

First, you can summon one duplicate per caster level before the spell ends.

Second, you can have up to one duplicate in existence at a time for every 3 caster levels you have.
effect_zh: 1个充满无限时间可能性的5呎立方体加上一个额外的立方体/等级
text_zh: 这个法术的效果如同时之盟友一样，但有以下两点不同。首先，在法术结束前，你可以召唤施法者等级个分身。其次，你最多可以同时拥有每3个施法者等级一个分身。
